quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.text: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
quotes.author: Hasidic Proverb

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down 'happy'. They told me I didn't understand the assignment, and I told them they didn't understand life.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: As we work to create light for others, we naturally light our own way.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Helen Keller
